name: fishki.net cleaner
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("fishki.net") {
   iframe, noindex,
   div[style="position:absolute"],
   img[src^="http://counter.rambler.ru/"],
   img[src^="http://count.rbc.ru/"],
/*   div[class="float100"],*/
/*   div[class="headerright"],*/
   ul[class="toplinks"],
   a[style*="color: #0000FF"],
   div[class="topic"] > h1 + a[href^="http://fishurl.ru/"],
   div[class="topic"] > h1 + b + br + br + a[href^="http://fishurl.ru/"],
   div[class="topic"] > a[href^="http://fishurl.ru/"] + div[class="bottombar"],
   table[class="additionalmenu"],
   div[class^="mb"],
   div[id="readme"],
   div[class="innerbox"] > a[class="red"],
   div[class="innerbox"] > a[onmousedown] > strong,
   div[class="innerbox"] > img[src^="http://rb.qip.ru/?bid="],
/*   div[class="leftbox nodecor"]*/
   div[class="pad"],
   div[class="footer"],
   div[id="viewCloud"],
   div[id*="teasernet_"],
   a[onmousedown] + strong,
   a.film-branding-link-top,
   div[style="position:absolute"],
   *[src*="advmaker.ru"],
   *[href*="advmaker.ru"],
   div[id="stop"],
   div[id*="advmaker"]
     {
        display: none !important
     }

   body, .allpage, .leftbranding, .leftcolumn, .rightcolumn, .rightcolumninner
     {
        background:#d8e5e9 !important
     }

}
